thread.title: Great Second Stay at Even Hotel - Times Square South
thread.title_full: Great Second Stay at Even Hotel - Times Square South - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: George W
title: Great Second Stay at Even Hotel - Times Square South
text: Great location, worked a full day in the hotel, when to meetings, saw Mo at the bar, so close to Penn Station, Time Square, and meetings...great price! Great place to stay - easy!! I would stay there again in a minute and the staff from the front desk to cleaning the rooms were all great!
